resources.string: Scan the QR code with either your camera or the Receipts and Rewards app to generate your receipt on your phone.
In the Receipts and Rewards app on your \'phone, tap the loyalty card you wish to redeem. Once tapped, scan this QR code and your voucher will be redeemed.
QR Code for receipt scanning is displayed here
Your loyalty offer has been processed. Please refresh the screen to see the discount applied to the order.
